name: BeatPick
tag_list: music-licensing, license-music, pre-cleared-music, sync-license, music-for-public-spaces, music-for-film, music-for-advertising, music-for-documentary, music-for-website, music-for-dvd, music-for-internet, creative-commons, in-store-music, background-musi
overview:
Beatpick.com was born in the February of 2006 as a net label that could cater also for music licensing. Over the course of the past three years BeatPick.com specialized in providing music for both commercial and non commercial multimedia projects.

Circa 250 independent artists have joined the service, from over 40 different countries. Commercial music licenses have been arranged for hundreds of small to mid-sized clients.

Music licenses were issued also for major brands such as 20th Century Fox, Ralph Lauren, Toyota, Dodge, Scott Wintersport, The Travel Channel,Chevrolet.

The company is also proud to have helped students, developing professionals and open source projects in finding good music to use for free in their non commercial projects.
